main event: An unidentified flying object with blue flames was sighted over Edna, Texas on July 6, 1954.
interesting points: The object was reported to be rocket-type with blue flames trailing it,The sighting lasted approximately 10-15 seconds,One jet aircraft (T-33) was airborne but was at a much higher altitude of 40,000 feet,The object was estimated to be below 4,333 feet during its flight,Preliminary analysis suggests it might have been a meteor or possibly a jet aircraft.
witness description: A Trans-Texas Airways pilot and a ground observer reported seeing the object.
